Name: Ordeal of Princess Eris
About the game: On the west end of the continent lies Hilbernia, a kingdom in decline. Its neighboring country to the east, Flosein, breaches their non-aggression pact by launching a surprise invasion. In the ensuing chaos, princess Eris manages to escape from the castle. As she watches the castle burn, she makes a vow to herself. 'I swear... I'll take back my beloved kingdom!' Features: Classic RPG experience Engaging story and plot Explore a fantasy world Turn based party battles
